title: Fonseka ungrateful – Tissa Attanayake
content: The UNP General Secretary made these comments addressing a Media Conference held at the UNP Headquarters, Sirikotha yesterday. Attanayake said that Sarath Fonseka addressing a meeting in Kurunegala recently has called upon all patriotic people to attend the joint opposition rally to be held at Hyde Park on the 18th of this month, to make…
